text:
・スピード ＋10
・高速移動 ＋15
・射撃属性被ダメージ －50%
・受けた攻撃のよろけ値を 70%かつ小数点以下切り捨て で計算
・格闘攻撃による敵機撃破時に最大HPの 15%分回復
・移動方向補正 全方向100%
※効果時間は 60秒
※6秒間、範囲75m程の敵機へ以下の効果を付与
trans:
・Speed: +10
・High-speed movement: +15
・Damage taken from shooting attributes: -50%
・Staggered threshold value from received attacks is calculated at 70%, rounded down to the nearest whole number.
・Recover 15% of max HP upon defeating an enemy unit with a melee attack
・Movement direction adjustment: 100% in all directions
*Effect duration: 60 seconds
*For 6 seconds, the following effects are applied to enemy units within approximately a 75m radius.
